Class TheaterOfWar

java.lang.Object
places.theather.TheaterOfWar
public class TheaterOfWar extends Object
Represents a theater of war where battles occur between different factions* This class manages simulation including battles, food management, clan chief actions...etc

    Description

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    changeStateCharacters()
    Changes the state of characters randomly during each simulation cycle 35% chance that a character's hunger increases by 5 20% chance that a character's potion effect evaporates Applies to all characters in all places.
    private void
    chiefsClanMoment()
    Gives each clan chief their turn to perform actions Creates a menu for each chief and starts their action phase
    private void
    deadFood()
    Ages food ingredients by changing their state from fresh to not fresh Displays a message when an ingredient becomes not fresh
    private void
    fight()
    Manages battles on battlefields.
    String
    showCharactersAllPlaces()
    Displays all characters present in each place of the theater For each place, lists the name and type of each character
    String
    showNumberOfCharacters()
    Calculates and displays the total number of characters present in all places
    String
    showPlace()
    Displays the list of all places in the theater
    private void
    spawnFood()
    Randomly spawns food ingredients in places except of the battlefields For each non-battlefield place, there is a 50% chance that a random ingredient will appear Displays a message when food appears
    void
    startSimulation()
    Starts the main simulation loop of the theater of war The simulation runs indefinitely and executes the following actions in order: Fights on battlefields Changes character states (hunger, potion effects) Spawns new food Ages existing food Gives clan chiefs their turn Each cycle is separated by a 1.5 second pause

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • TheaterOfWar

      public TheaterOfWar(String name, int maxPlaces, List<Place> places, List<ClanChief> chiefs)
      Constructor for the theater of war.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the theater
      maxPlaces - The maximum number of places allowed
      places - The list of places in the theater
      chiefs - The list of clan chiefs

  • Method Details

    • showPlace

      public String showPlace()
      Displays the list of all places in the theater
      Returns:
      the list

    • showNumberOfCharacters

      public String showNumberOfCharacters()
      Calculates and displays the total number of characters present in all places

    • showCharactersAllPlaces

      public String showCharactersAllPlaces()
      Displays all characters present in each place of the theater For each place, lists the name and type of each character

    • fight

      private void fight()
      Manages battles on battlefields. Identifies all Gallic and Roman characters present Romans randomly attack Romans (deals 10 damage) Gauls randomly attack Gauls (deals 10 damage) Characters with 0 or fewer health points are removed

    • changeStateCharacters

      private void changeStateCharacters()
      Changes the state of characters randomly during each simulation cycle 35% chance that a character's hunger increases by 5 20% chance that a character's potion effect evaporates Applies to all characters in all places.

    • spawnFood

      private void spawnFood()
      Randomly spawns food ingredients in places except of the battlefields For each non-battlefield place, there is a 50% chance that a random ingredient will appear Displays a message when food appears

    • deadFood

      private void deadFood()
      Ages food ingredients by changing their state from fresh to not fresh Displays a message when an ingredient becomes not fresh

    • chiefsClanMoment

      private void chiefsClanMoment()
      Gives each clan chief their turn to perform actions Creates a menu for each chief and starts their action phase

    • startSimulation

      public void startSimulation()
      Starts the main simulation loop of the theater of war The simulation runs indefinitely and executes the following actions in order: Fights on battlefields Changes character states (hunger, potion effects) Spawns new food Ages existing food Gives clan chiefs their turn Each cycle is separated by a 1.5 second pause
